attributes.action: stop bringing persons convicted abroad back to the UK to serve their sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned appeal to the PM to stop the repatriation of UK Citizens who have been convicted & jailed abroad so that they might serve out a shorter sentence in more luxurious conditions.
This policy is a drain on our ecconomy, will cause over crowding in our Prisons & gives the impression that British people can commit any crimes abroad because they will eventually end up back Home on a "cushy number".
Crime committed abroad should be punished abroad.
